comments.comments_text: Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.

comments.comments_text: Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) launches the ball from the resulting corner, but one of the defenders is first to the ball and deals with the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) launches the ball from the resulting corner, but one of the defenders is first to the ball and deals with the threat.

comments.comments_text: A dangerous looking corner kick from Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) is cleared to safety by the defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A dangerous looking corner kick from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is cleared to safety by the defence.

comments.comments_text: What a GOAL that is! Richarlison (Everton) showed great determination to get to the ball inside the box and acrobatically launched himself into the air and produced a scissor kick of the highest quality to leave David de Gea helpless. He makes it 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: What a GOAL that is! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) showed great determination to get to the ball inside the box and acrobatically launched himself into the air and produced a scissor kick of the highest quality to leave [PLAYER] helpless. He makes it 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.

comments.comments_text: Lucas Digne (Everton) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.

comments.comments_text: Lucas Digne (Everton) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.

comments.comments_text: Idrissa Gueye (Everton) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Paul Tierney had an easy-decision to make.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is booked after bringing down an opponent. [REFEREE] had an easy-decision to make.

comments.comments_text: Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.

comments.comments_text: Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) scores an incredible goal! He receives a pass, makes some space for himself and unleashes a long-range thunderbolt of a shot past the goalkeeper into the bottom left corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) scores an incredible goal! He receives a pass, makes some space for himself and unleashes a long-range thunderbolt of a shot past the goalkeeper into the bottom left corner.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Chris Smalling (Manchester United) saw red with that tackle. Paul Tierney won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It looks like [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) saw red with that tackle. [REFEREE] won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: The corner from Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) is hurriedly cleared.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is hurriedly cleared.

comments.comments_text: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer prepares a substitution. Phil Jones is replaced by Ashley Young (Manchester United).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] prepares a substitution. [PLAYER] is replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Substitution. Fred walks off the pitch and Scott McTominay (Manchester United) comes on as a substitute.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Substitution. [PLAYER] walks off the pitch and [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) comes on as a substitute.

comments.comments_text: Marco Silva is forced to make a change. Richarlison is not able to carry on due to injury. He is replaced by Theo Walcott (Everton).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] is forced to make a change. [PLAYER] is not able to carry on due to injury. He is replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) puts a cross into the box from the corner but there is no panic from the opposition and they easily clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) puts a cross into the box from the corner but there is no panic from the opposition and they easily clear.

comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Lucas Digne (Everton) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of David de Gea. 3:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of [PLAYER]. 3:0.

comments.comments_text: Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) sends the corner into the box, but David de Gea intercepts it and averts the threat.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Gylfi Sigurdsson slips a clever pass through to Theo Walcott (Everton), who moves inside the box and sends a measured shot beyond the keeper and into the bottom right corner. 4:0.
